about_the_game:
Take your escapades into the Office and other new locations in this long awaited sequel to House Party!  You've made it through the interview process and you're starting a new job.  Make a good impression and get promoted.  Make the wrong choices and get demoted.  Work your way up the corporate ladder in this hysterical, story-rich 3D adventure game with a lot of new surprises and upgrades from the traditional House Party game play.

Office Party's unique system shapes and molds the game's content around your choices.  Become the boss!  Have a party!  Get fired! (Ok you probably don't want  to do that one, or maybe you do to see what happens...)  Different paths will open different opportunities and game content.  Weigh the choices you make carefully.  You never know when one of your coworkers may end up holding your livelihood in their hands!

  • Travel between various locations like the player's apartment, office, and more

  • Establish relationships with NPCs through your interactions, choices, and actions

  • Obtain items that can help you in your endeavors 

  • Complete tasks to improve your standing at work

  • Customize your character and apartment

  • Work toward upgrades for your apartment and belongings

  • Manage your character's time and work/life balance

  • Strap in and go for the ride of your life

Enjoy new characters, new stories, and new shenanigans as we expand on and refine the House Party engine and graphics to bring you all of the quirkiness and humor you already know and love combined with new environments to explore, and some fun new game mechanics!

We learned a lot from the first time around, and have been working hard on modifying our code engine and changing up our approach to Office Party in many ways for better optimization and gameplay, and a smooth player experience!

Keep an eye out for more details coming soon!

name: Office Party

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel I5 4690 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480 (4GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 8700K / AMD r5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060 Super / RX 5700 XT (8GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required

short_description: Office Party is a fully 3D edgy comedy adventure game inspired by classic comedies of the '90s, and also the long awaited sequel to House Party. Dive into the craziness and debauchery with all new characters, game mechanics and locations, and maybe a visit from some old party friends.
